Quiz App [ By JustSp3cial ] Q1. What is the full meaning of OS? Operation System Operating System Open Source
Q2.In binary code, the number 7 is written as? 111 101 110
Q3. Which of the following is an input device? Mouse VDU Keyboard
Q4. In which generation of computers, transistors were used? l Q5. In IT terminology failure in the kernel is called? Kernel error Kernel bug Crash
Q6. RAM is an example of---- memory?
Q7. Which of the following is an example of hardware? Scanner Printer Interpreter
Q8. The OSI reference model is divided into how many layers?
Q9. Which of the following is an example of non-volatile memory? RAM ROM Cache memory
Q10.ALU stands for? Arithmetic and Logical Units Arithmetic Long Unit All Longer Units
